title: Spite

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose two players. The first player now **spites** the other. They learn this
Attribute:
- Players who **spite** someone else must do everything in their power to make the person they spite lose. If they are on the same team then they must get the other hung instead.
- If a player inflicted with **Spite** cannot win if they do not meet this condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See that at least 3 players inflicted with **Spite** achieve their condition
